REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2495 reute d f BC-KENNER-PARKER-<KPT>-C 04-03 0071

TEXT.TITLE: KENNER PARKER <KPT> CONCLUDES TWO SUITS
TEXT.BODY: Kenner Parker Toys Inc's Parker Brothers said it obtained injunctions in two trademark infringement cases. One action was brought against Kits Games, which planned to market a game called Worldopoly, which was very similar to Kenner's Monopoly. The second case was brought against Citigames of America Inc which marketed a game called Hometown Monopoly. Reuter
